nodes.bodyText: Maybe "supported_architectures" or "architecture_support_override" @nikosmoum what do you think?

I agree that the word "package(s)" is not needed. All that candlepin needs to know is that a consumer/system can support multiple architectures, so "supported_architectures" sounds good (ideally a non-debian/ubuntu client could re-use the same fact for supporting multiple architectures that comes from something other than a file managed by a package management system).
Thank you very much for your suggestions. I updated the PR but was not able to test it right now.
